page.title: 02Villages
page.content:
{Newton Bewley
This is a very small village on the A689 to Hartlepool.It has a farm,a few farm cottages,a Public House and a Garage.There is a Mill in the village but it is no longer in use.
{Wolviston { In the centre of the village is The Village Green.It has many beautiful trees.Facing The Green is Wolviston Primary School. We have a large duck pond in the village which is visited by a good variety of birds.The village children like to fish in the pond. The village has a High Street where all the shops can be found.
